LinkedIn's Data Team (stream processing) | Mountain View, CA | Onsite Full-time

The team at LinkedIn who develops Kafka (http://kafka.apache.org), Samza (http://samza.apache.org), and Databus (https://github.com/linkedin/databus) is hiring for multiple positions in SRE and development at all levels. For more info on the type of work we do, take a look at: https://engineering.linkedin.com/data

We'll be having a recruiting event onsite at 2061 Stierlin Court in Mountain View, CA on May 11th, 2016 at 6:30 PM. If you're interested in attending, head over to http://www.meetup.com/LinkedIn-Data-Infrastructure-Meetup/ev... for the latest info.

If you're interested, but can't make it to Mountain View, CA on May 11th, please contact Kartik at kparamasivam@linkedin.com.
